inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('MentalResistance', 'Stackable', 25); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('SpellResistance', 10); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Strength of Mind
description: The monk has trained their mind to be particularly resilient, gaining a +25 bonus to all Mental Resistance checks and 10% spell resistance.
